member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Configuration
member.summary: This is the first try of an alternative configuration GUI that can be used instead of the CodeSmith GUI and bases on feature diagrams.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Configuration.components
member.summary: Erforderliche Designervariable.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Configuration.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor which calls the initialisation method of the form.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Configuration.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Die verwendeten Ressourcen bereinigen.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Configuration.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature
member.summary: Represents a feature.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.root
member.summary: Indicates that this feature is the root node of the feature tree.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.name
member.summary: The name of this feature

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.description
member.summary: Detailed description of this feature.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.guid
member.summary: The guid of this feature in the feature diagram.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.type
member.summary: The type of this feature if is represents a variable. If it does not, the type is null;

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.minCardinality
member.summary: The minimum number of instances of this feature

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.maxCardinality
member.summary: The maximum number of instances of this feature

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.parent
member.summary: The parent feature of this feature in the feature tree. Null, if this is the root feature.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.children
member.summary: A list of child features of this feature in the feature tree. Empty, if this is a leaf feature.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor. Sets the default values.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.AddChild(Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature)
member.summary: Adds a child to the list of children of this feature.
member.param: A feature in the same feature tree which is a child of this feature.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this feature.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of this feature

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Description
member.summary: Returns the description of this feature

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Guid
member.summary: Returns the guid of this feature

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.IsRoot
member.summary: Indicates if this feature is the root node of the feature tree

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.isLeaf
member.summary: Indicates if this feature is a leaf in the feature tree.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Type
member.summary: The type of the feature if it represents a variable. If it does not the type is null.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.MinCardinality
member.summary: The minimum number of instances of the feature in the feature tree.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.MaxCardinality
member.summary: The maximum number of instances of the feature in the feature tree.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Parent
member.summary: The parent feature of this feature in the feature tree. Null, if this is the root feature.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature.Children
member.summary: Returns a list of children of this feature in the feature node. Changes to this list will not change the inner state of this feature.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser
member.summary: Parser for XML files which implement cfrepository1_0.dtd. These files contain XML representations of feature diagrams created by CaptainFeature.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.rootNode
member.summary: Holds the root node of the feature diagramm, which also is the return value of the parse method.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.features
member.summary: Holds all features in the diagram. The hash key is the name of the feature / node.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the file given by its filename.
member.param: Name of a file containg a CaptainFeature repository.
member.returns: The root feature of the feature diagram.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.ParseFeatureSpace(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator)
member.summary: Parses the feature space and creates Feature objects including their connections for all features described in it.
member.param: A XPathNodeIterator pointing to the FeatureSpace node.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.ParseFeature(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator)
member.summary: Parses a feature node and creates a Feature object containing the same information.
member.param: XPathNodeIterator representing a "feature node" of the FeatureSpace.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.ParseDiagram(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator)
member.summary: Parses the feature diagramm and builds the internal feature tree.
member.param: XPathNodeIterator representing the "diagram node" of the FeatureSpace.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.FeatureRepositoryParser.ParseCardinality(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.Feature)
member.summary: Parses a cardinality node of a feature diagram description. Adds all necessary information to the Feature object represented in the current cardinality node and calls itself recursively for the cardinality nodes that are children of the corresponding FeatureNode.
member.param: XPathNavigator representing the current Cardinality node.
Feature representing the parent node of the current Cardinality node.
member.returns: Feature representing the current Cardinality node.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternConfiguration.MainClass
member.summary: Implements a test of the CodeTemplateParser
